law.catch_line: Plats or surveys not to be recorded unless certified by a professional land surveyor.
law.text: No county clerk of any county, or any other public authority, shall accept for filing, file, or record any map, plat, survey, or other document related to the practice of land surveying, unless it evidences certification by a professional land surveyor by whom, or under whose personal supervision and direction, the map, plat, survey, or other document was prepared.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 214, sec. 34, effective January 1, 1999. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 291, sec. 34, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 482, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 68, sec. 9.
